School Notes

The curriculum at Horizon Christian School emphasizes a Biblical worldview, and intentionally promotes an atmosphere of Christ's love that encourages our students to obey God's Word and trust fully in God's sovereignty. It is the work of Horizon Christian School to provide an intentional educational framework which equips our students with the skills necessary to pursue God's calling in their lives. The students at Horizon have achieved above the national average on national standardized tests, and above the Indiana average on the ISTEP. Courses are aligned with Indiana State Standards and taught through a Christian worldview. We continually review and enhance our academics, providing our students with the essential skills to succeed. Our students go on to a variety of colleges, including Anderson University, Indiana University, Indiana Wesleyan University, IUPUI, Purdue University, Taylor University, and many others.

Frequently Asked Questions

What schools are Horizon Christian School often compared to?

Horizon Christian Schoolis often viewed alongside schools like Heritage Christian School by visitors of our site.

What is the acceptance rate of Horizon Christian School?

The acceptance rate of Horizon Christian School is 80%, which is lower than the national average of 88%. Horizon Christian School's acceptance rate is ranked among the top private schools in Indiana with low acceptance rates.

What sports does Horizon Christian School offer?

Horizon Christian School offers 8 interscholastic sports: Baseball, Basketball, Cheering, Cross Country, Soccer, Softball, Track and Field and Volleyball.

What is Horizon Christian School's ranking?

Horizon Christian School ranks among the top 20% of private schools in Indiana for: Lowest average acceptance rates, Highest percentage of students of color and Largest student body.

When is the application deadline for Horizon Christian School?

The application deadline for Horizon Christian School is rolling (applications are reviewed as they are received year-round).

In what neighborhood is Horizon Christian School located?

Horizon Christian School is located in the Lawrence Fort Ben Oaklandon neighborhood of Indianapolis, IN. There are 5 other private schools located in Lawrence Fort Ben Oaklandon.
